Text: Please hard-code your subtitles again. The past few episodes have not been hardcoded and thus I cannot play them over my Xbox onto the TV.

@Morrowgamer Hey you can also use a free software called Handbrake. I use it all the time to convert mkvs to mp4/m4vs so I can play them on my xbox 360. You can play around with settings, but I hardcode the subs onto the exported videos. It's also the fastest & best converter I've ever used imho. Google it and give it a try, that way you can have what you want every time ;)
Hey k1ng thanks for the upload, I just heard about this series and wanted to add it to my list to watch. I've got a ways to go, but nonetheless I appreciate all your uploads for it!
@DialupBroski - I tried a few times, it doesn't seem to recognize that there are any subtitles. Will fiddle as much as I can but it doesn't seem to be working.
